name: TvGids.nl Dark 2022
description: Lightweight dark & clean theme for the www.tvgids.nl website, including Ad-suppression.
additional_info:
v1.40 - Updated theme to support 2022 website layout.
v1.30 - Support for new website-layout markup. Increased letter-spacing for article-text a bit.
v1.28 - Minor update the the current-programme background in the Guide section
v1.27 - Darkened the main background a bit more, darked the Nu & Straks red (bottom) timeline
v1.26 - Styled scrollbar, lightened the main menubar text a bit and darked the main-background a bit
v1.25 - Added support for the new 'Age Guidance' SVG icons and On Demand subtitle-styling
v1.24 - Added support for the updated time-detail label color
v1.23 - Reinstalled visibility of the 'upper footer' to comply with new scroll-handler script
v1.22 - Updated Ad-block definitions, zero visible ads again as of 2019-01-20
v1.21 - Darkened the Algemene Voorwaarden, Privacy Statement and Cookie Statement pages
v1.20 - Darkened the updated search-overlay and login-screen and removed the doormat-footer completely
v1.12 - Fixed some sub-header text-colours (v1.11 was not overriding all of them)
v1.11 - Darkened content-seperator lines a bit compared to the text
v1.10 - Support for the new 2018-12 design
v1.01 - Fix hover text-color in Nu & Straks
